DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether there is a difference in muscle strength after anterior cruciate ligament comparing 2 surgery technics. Using either autograft hamstrings tendon or a autograft quadriceps tendon.
DOC.brief_title: Anterior Cruciate Ligament-reconstruction: Quadriceps Tendon or Hamstrings Tendon? A Prospective Trial
DOC.criteria: Anterior cruciate ligament rupture current malignant disease Rheumatoid arthritis Other knee ligament instability Obesity BMI >30 Morbus Bechterew
